PROMPTSETXUI.XUIEDITOR:
<dialog height="506" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="279" top="4" width="420"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Parameters"><properties><entry name="text">Parameters</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_FILEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="RPM file" tooltip="Name of the rpm package file to install. The file name may contain also a path. Following entries are e.g. valid: package.rpm /path/to/package.rpm" upper="0" required="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">RPM file</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_FILEs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Name of the rpm package file to install. The file name may contain also a path. Following entries are e.g. valid:
package.rpm
/path/to/package.rpm</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_UPGRADEs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Upgrade" tooltip="This upgrades or installs the package currently installed to a newer version. This is the same as install, except all other version(s) of the package are removed after the new package is installed." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Upgrade</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_UPGRADEs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">This upgrades or installs the package currently installed to a newer version. This is the same as install, except all other version(s) of the package are removed after the new package is installed.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_FAIL_IF_INSTALLEDs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Fail if installed" tooltip="If set to 'yes', the runbook function fails if the package with the same version is already installed." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Fail if installed</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_FAIL_IF_INSTALLEDs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">If set to 'yes', the runbook function fails if the package with the same version is already installed.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_INSTALL_PREFIXs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Install prefix" tooltip="For relocatable binary packages, translate all file paths that start with the installation prefix in the package relocation hint(s) to &UC4RB_RPM_INSTALL_PREFIX#. Uses the option --prefix &UC4RB_RPM_INSTALL_PREFIX# if the parameter is not empty." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Install prefix</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_INSTALL_PREFIXs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">For relocatable binary packages, translate all file paths that start with the installation prefix in the package relocation hint(s) to &UC4RB_RPM_INSTALL_PREFIX#. Uses the option --prefix &UC4RB_RPM_INSTALL_PREFIX# if the parameter is not empty.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_INSTALL_RELOCATEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Relocate" tooltip="For relocatable binary packages, translate all file paths that start with OLDPATH in the package relocation hint(s) to a new path. This option can be used repeatedly if several oldpath's in the package are to be relocated. Exampl: use "oldpath1=newpath1, oldpath2=newpath2" as parameter to translate several pathes. In this example, during execution the option --relocate oldpath1=newpath1 --relocate oldpath2=newpath2 is used when calling the rpm tool." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Relocate</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_INSTALL_RELOCATEs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">For relocatable binary packages, translate all file paths that start with OLDPATH in the package relocation hint(s) to a new path. This option can be used repeatedly if several oldpath's in the package are to be relocated. Exampl: use "oldpath1=newpath1, oldpath2=newpath2" as parameter to translate several pathes. In this example, during execution the option --relocate oldpath1=newpath1 --relocate oldpath2=newpath2 is used when calling the rpm tool.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_ALL_FILESs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="All files" tooltip="Installs or upgrades all the missingok files in the package, regardless if they exist. Uses the --allfiles option, if set to "yes"" alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">All files</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_ALL_FILESs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Installs or upgrades all the missingok files in the package, regardless if they exist. Uses the --allfiles option, if set to "yes"</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_EXCLUDE_PATHs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Exclude path" tooltip="Don't install files whose name begins with OLDPATH. Uses the --excludepath OLDPATH option if parameter not empty." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Exclude path</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_EXCLUDE_PATHs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Don't install files whose name begins with OLDPATH. Uses the --excludepath OLDPATH option if parameter not empty.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_EXCLUDE_DOCSs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Exclude docs" tooltip="Don't install any files which are marked as documentation (which includes man pages and texinfo documents). Uses the --excludedocs flag if parameter not empty." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Exclude docs</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_EXCLUDE_DOCSs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Don't install any files which are marked as documentation (which includes man pages and texinfo documents). Uses the --excludedocs flag if parameter not empty.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_REPLACE_FILESs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Replace files" tooltip="Install the packages even if they replace files from other, already installed, packages. Uses the --replacefiles flag if parameter set to yes." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Replace files</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_REPLACE_FILESs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Install the packages even if they replace files from other, already installed, packages. Uses the --replacefiles flag if parameter set to yes.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_REPLACE_PACKAGESs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Replace packages" tooltip="Install the packages even if some of them are already installed on this system. Uses the --replacepkgs flag if parameter set to yes." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Replace packages</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_REPLACE_PACKAGESs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Install the packages even if some of them are already installed on this system. Uses the --replacepkgs flag if parameter set to yes.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_REPLACE_OLD_PACKAGESs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Replace old pacakges" tooltip="Allow an upgrade to replace a newer package with an older one. Uses the --oldpackage flag if parameter set to yes." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Replace old pacakges</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_REPLACE_OLD_PACKAGESs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Allow an upgrade to replace a newer package with an older one. Uses the --oldpackage flag if parameter set to yes.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_SPACE_CHECKs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Ignore disk size" tooltip="Don't check mount file systems for sufficient disk space before installing this package. Uses the --ignoresize flag if parameter set to yes." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Ignore disk size</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_SPACE_CHECKs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Don't check mount file systems for sufficient disk space before installing this package. Uses the --ignoresize flag if parameter set to yes.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_ARCH_CHECKs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Ignore architecture" tooltip="Allow installation or upgrading even if the architectures of the binary package and host don't match. Uses the --ignorearch flag if parameter set to yes." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Ignore architecture</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_ARCH_CHECKs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Allow installation or upgrading even if the architectures of the binary package and host don't match. Uses the --ignorearch flag if parameter set to yes.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_OS_TYPE_CHECKs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Ignore OS type" tooltip="Allow installation or upgrading even if the operating systems of the binary package and host don't match. Uses the --ignoreos flag if parameter set to yes." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Ignore OS type</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_OS_TYPE_CHECKs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Allow installation or upgrading even if the operating systems of the binary package and host don't match. Uses the --ignoreos flag if parameter set to yes.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_ONLY_DB_UPDATEs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="DB update only" tooltip="Update only the database, not the filesystem. Uses the --justdb flag if parameter set to yes" alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">DB update only</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_ONLY_DB_UPDATEs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Update only the database, not the filesystem. Uses the --justdb flag if parameter set to yes</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_DIGESTs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Ignore digest" tooltip="Don't verify package or header digests when reading. Uses the --nodigest flag if parameter set to yes." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Ignore digest</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_DIGESTs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Don't verify package or header digests when reading. Uses the --nodigest flag if parameter set to yes.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_MANIFESTs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Ignore manifest" tooltip="Don't process non-package files as manifests. Uses the --nomanifest flag if parameter set to yes." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Ignore manifest</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_MANIFESTs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Don't process non-package files as manifests. Uses the --nomanifest flag if parameter set to yes.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_HDR_SIGNs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Ignore header signatures" tooltip="Don't verify package or header signatures when reading. Uses the --nosignature flag if parameter set to yes." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Ignore header signatures</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_HDR_SIGNs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Don't verify package or header signatures when reading. Uses the --nosignature flag if parameter set to yes.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_DEP_CHECKs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Ignore dependency check" tooltip="Don't do a dependency check before installing or upgrading a package. Uses the --nodeps flag if parameter set to yes." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Ignore dependency check</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_IGNORE_DEP_CHECKs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Don't do a dependency check before installing or upgrading a package. Uses the --nodeps flag if parameter set to yes.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_DONT_REORDERs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Don't reorder" tooltip="Don't reorder the packages for an install. The list of packages would normally be reordered to satisfy dependencies. Uses the --noorder flag if parameter set to yes." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Don't reorder</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_DONT_REORDERs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Don't reorder the packages for an install. The list of packages would normally be reordered to satisfy dependencies. Uses the --noorder flag if parameter set to yes.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_NO_SCRIPTSs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="No script execution" tooltip="Don't execute the pre/post/preun/postun scriptlets. This parameter is equivalent to the options &UC4RB_RPM_NO_PRE_SCRIPT# = yes, &UC4RB_RPM_NO_POST_SCRIPT# = yes, &UC4RB_RPM_NO_PREUN_SCRIPT# = yes, &UC4RB_RPM_NO_POSTUN_SCRIPT# = yes, and turns off the execution of the corresponding scriptlets." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">No script execution</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_NO_SCRIPTSs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Don't execute the pre/post/preun/postun scriptlets. This parameter is equivalent to the options &UC4RB_RPM_NO_PRE_SCRIPT# = yes, &UC4RB_RPM_NO_POST_SCRIPT# = yes, &UC4RB_RPM_NO_PREUN_SCRIPT# = yes, &UC4RB_RPM_NO_POSTUN_SCRIPT# = yes, and turns off the execution of the corresponding scriptlets.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_NO_PRE_SCRIPTs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="No pre-script execution" tooltip="Don't execute the pre scriptlet. Uses the --nopre flag if parameter set to yes." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">No pre-script execution</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_NO_PRE_SCRIPTs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Don't execute the pre scriptlet. Uses the --nopreun flag if parameter set to yes.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_NO_POSTUN_SCRIPTs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="No postun-script execution" tooltip="Don't execute the postun scriptlet. Uses the --nopostun flag if parameter set to yes." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">No postun-script execution</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_NO_POSTUN_SCRIPTs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Don't execute the postun scriptlet. Uses the --nopostun flag if parameter set to yes.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_NO_TRIGGERSs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="No trigger script execution" tooltip="Don't execute the triggerin/triggerun/triggerpostun scriptlets. This parameter is equivalent to the options &UC4RB_RPM_NO_TRIGGER_IN# = yes, &UC4RB_RPM_NO_TRIGGER_UN# = yes, &UC4RB_RPM_NO_TRIGGER_POSTUN# = yes, and turns off the execution of the corresponding scriptlets." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">No trigger script execution</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_NO_TRIGGERSs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Don't execute the triggerin/triggerun/triggerpostun scriptlets. This parameter is equivalent to the options &UC4RB_RPM_NO_TRIGGER_IN# = yes, &UC4RB_RPM_NO_TRIGGER_UN# = yes, &UC4RB_RPM_NO_TRIGGER_POSTUN# = yes, and turns off the execution of the corresponding scriptlets.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_NO_TRIGGER_INs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="No triggerin script execution" tooltip="Don't execute the triggerin scriptlet. Uses the --notriggerun flag if parameter set to yes." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">No triggerun script execution</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_NO_TRIGGER_UNs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Don't execute the triggerun scriptlet. Uses the --notriggerun flag if parameter set to yes.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_NO_TRIGGER_POSTUNs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="No triggerpostun script execution" tooltip="Don't execute the triggerpostun scriptlet. Uses the --notriggerpostun flag if parameter set to yes." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">No triggerpostun script execution</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_NO_TRIGGER_POSTUNs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Don't execute the triggerpostun scriptlet. Uses the --notriggerpostun flag if parameter set to yes.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_TEST_ONLYs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Dont install/upgrade, just test" tooltip="Do not install the package, simply check for and report potential conflicts. Uses the --test flag if parameter set to yes." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Dont install/upgrade, just test</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_TEST_ONLYs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Do not install the package, simply check for and report potential conflicts. Uses the --test flag if parameter set to yes.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_VIA_FTPs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Download via FTP prior install/upgrade" tooltip="rpm can act as an FTP client so that packages can be queried or installed/upgraded from an FTP server. Use option "yes" to activate FTP download prior package install/upgrade. Passive (PASV) ftp transfers are performed. Internally, the following URL is constructed and passed to the "rpm" tool: ftp://&UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_FTP_USER#:&UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_FTP_PWD#@&UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_HOST#:&UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_PORT#&UC4RB_RPM_FILE# e.g. ftp://myuser:mypwd@192.168.44.20:21/path/to/package.rpm" alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Download via FTP prior install/upgrade</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_VIA_FTPs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">rpm can act as an FTP client so that packages can be queried or installed/upgraded from an FTP server. Use option "yes" to activate FTP download prior package install/upgrade. Passive (PASV) ftp transfers are performed. Internally, the following URL is constructed and passed to the "rpm" tool:
ftp://&UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_FTP_USER#:&UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_FTP_PWD#@&UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_HOST#:&UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_PORT#&UC4RB_RPM_FILE#
e.g. ftp://myuser:mypwd@192.168.44.20:21/path/to/package.rpm</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_VIA_HTTPs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Download via HTTP prior install/upgrade" tooltip="rpm can act as an HTTP client so that packages can be queried or installed/upgraded from an HTTP server. Use option "yes" to activate HTTP download prior package install/upgrade. Internally, the following URL is constructed and passed to the "rpm" tool: http://&UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_HOST#:&UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_PORT#&UC4RB_RPM_FILE# e.g. http://192.168.44.20:80/path/to/package.rpm" alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Download via HTTP prior install/upgrade</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_VIA_HTTPs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">rpm can act as an HTTP client so that packages can be queried or installed/upgraded from an HTTP server. Use option "yes" to activate HTTP download prior package install/upgrade. Internally, the following URL is constructed and passed to the "rpm" tool:
http://&UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_HOST#:&UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_PORT#&UC4RB_RPM_FILE#
e.g. http://192.168.44.20:80/path/to/package.rpm</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_HOSTs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="FTP/HTTP Host" tooltip="Host name or IP adress to use when downloading a rpm package from a remote host (either via HTTP or FTP)." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_HOSTs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Host name or IP adress to use when downloading a rpm package from a remote host (either via HTTP or FTP).</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><integer enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_PORTs.00" max="" min="" nl="1" text="FTP/HTTP Port" tooltip="FTP/HTTP port to use." alt="1"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_NUMERIC</entry><entry name="text">FTP/HTTP Port</entry><entry name="min"/><entry name="max"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_PORTs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">FTP/HTTP port to use.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue">0</entry></properties></integer><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_FTP_USERs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="FTP User" tooltip="User name to use to authenticate with the FTP server. If both the user AND password are omitted, anonymous ftp is used. If the portion is omitted, the password will be prompted for (once per user/hostname pair). If both the user and password are omitted, anonymous ftp is used. " upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">FTP User</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_FTP_USERs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">User name to use to authenticate with the FTP server. If both the user AND password are omitted, anonymous ftp is used.
If the portion is omitted, the password will be prompted for (once per user/hostname pair). If both the user and password are omitted, anonymous ftp is used.
</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_FTP_PWDs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="1" text="FTP Password" tooltip="Password to use to authenticate with the FTP server. If both the user AND password are omitted, anonymous ftp is used. If the portion is omitted, the password will be prompted for (once per user/hostname pair). If both the user and password are omitted, anonymous ftp is used. " upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">FTP Password</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_DOWNLOAD_FTP_PWDs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">1</entry><entry name="tooltip">Password to use to authenticate with the FTP server. If both the user AND password are omitted, anonymous ftp is used.
If the portion is omitted, the password will be prompted for (once per user/hostname pair). If both the user and password are omitted, anonymous ftp is used.
</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_FTP_PROXY_HOSTs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="FTP proxy host" tooltip="The host will be used as a proxy server for all ftp transfers, which allows users to ftp through firewall machines which use proxy systems. During execution the parameter --ftpproxy &UC4RB_RPM_FTP_PROXY_HOST# of the rpm tool is used." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">FTP proxy host</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_FTP_PROXY_HOSTs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">The host will be used as a proxy server for all ftp transfers, which allows users to ftp through firewall machines which use proxy systems. During execution the parameter --ftpproxy &UC4RB_RPM_FTP_PROXY_HOST# of the rpm tool is used.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><integer enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_FTP_PROXY_PORTs.00" max="" min="" nl="1" text="FTP proxy port" tooltip="The TCP port number to use for the ftp connection on the proxy ftp server instead of the default port. During execution the parameter --ftpport &UC4RB_RPM_FTP_PROXY_PORT# of the rpm tool is used. The parameter is however only generated if &UC4RB_RPM_FTP_PROXY_HOST# is not empty." alt="1"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_NUMERIC</entry><entry name="text">FTP proxy port</entry><entry name="min"/><entry name="max"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_FTP_PROXY_PORTs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">The TCP port number to use for the ftp connection on the proxy ftp server instead of the default port. During execution the parameter --ftpport &UC4RB_RPM_FTP_PROXY_PORT# of the rpm tool is used. The parameter is however only generated if &UC4RB_RPM_FTP_PROXY_HOST# is not empty.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue">0</entry></properties></integer><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_HTTP_PROXY_HOSTs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="HTTP proxy host" tooltip="The host will be used as a proxy server for all http transfers, which allows users to http through firewall machines which use proxy systems. During execution the parameter --httproxy &UC4RB_RPM_HTTP_PROXY_HOST# of the rpm tool is used." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">HTTP proxy host</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_HTTP_PROXY_HOSTs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">The host will be used as a proxy server for all http transfers, which allows users to http through firewall machines which use proxy systems.
